System Requirement

To successfully run JMeter and Selenium, your system must meet certain hardware and software specifications. Ensuring that your environment aligns with these requirements will help prevent issues during installation and execution of tests. Below are the requirements for both JMeter and Selenium.

JMeter

Software Requirements

Hardware Requirements

OS: Windows, macOS, and Linux

Processor: Dual-core or better

JDK: Java 8 or above

RAM: At least 4 GB (8 GB or more recommended)

Web Browser: Any modern web browser

Storage: Minimum of 500 MB free space

Selenium

Software Requirements

Hardware Requirements

Browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, IE

Processor: Multi-core (Intel/AMD)

WebDriver for browser automation

RAM: 4 GB (min), 8 GB (recommended)

Languages: Java, Python, C#, Ruby, JavaScript

Storage: 500 MB (min), SSD recommended

Test Frameworks: TestNG, JUnit, Pytest, NUnit

Network: Stable internet connection

IDE: Eclipse, IntelliJ, PyCharm, Visual Studio

Build Tools (optional): Maven, Gradle, pip

Version Control: Git

OS: Windows, macOS, Linux
